precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Click the 'Start' button on the taskbar.
expected_results: The Start menu will open, displaying a list of options.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will open, displaying various system categories.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open and displaying the "Pick a category" view. The "Appearance and Themes" icon is visible.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will transition to display the "Appearance and Themes" category.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and the 'Appearance and Themes' category is visible.
The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Themes" tab active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" tab and its options. The preview window at the bottom will show a black screen with the text "Windows XP", reflecting the currently selected screensaver.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' window is open.
action: Click on the dropdown button of the 'Screen Saver' selection box.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of available screen saver options will appear.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The checkbox labeled "On resume, password protect" is checked.
action: Click the checkbox labeled "On resume, password protect".
expected_results: The "On resume, password protect" checkbox will become unchecked.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open, and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Power" button is located under the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button for the "Turn off monitor" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time intervals to choose from.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu should be open.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option within the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" option will be set to "After 5 hours" for the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available power schemes will expand, allowing you to choose a different power plan.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power schemes" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "Always On" item in the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: Two buttons, "Save As..." and "Delete", will appear next to the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.

precondition: The Power Options Properties window is open and the 'Always On' power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button for the 'Turn off hard disks' setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of time intervals will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button labeled "Turn off monitor" within the "Settings for Always On power scheme" section.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time interval options ranging from "After 1 min" to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click the "Never" item in the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" dropdown menu will close, and the system will be set to never hibernate automatically.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open with the desired power scheme settings configured.
action: Click the 'OK' button at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will close. The selected power scheme and its settings will be applied.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab selected.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window is open.
action: Click the 'Close' button in the top right corner of the "Appearance and Themes" window.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" window will close.
